| --- | --- | --- |

<a name="getPage"></a>

## getPage() ⇒ <code>Object</code>
Get page data

**Kind**: global function  
<a name="getQueryFromSearch"></a>

## getQueryFromSearch([search]) ⇒ <code>Object</code>
Get query from search

**Kind**: global function  

| Param | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [search] | <code>string</code> | <code>&quot;location.search&quot;</code> | 

<a name="mergeQueryToSearch"></a>

## mergeQueryToSearch(query)
Merge additional query into search

**Kind**: global function  

| Param | Type |
| --- | --- |
| query | <code>Object</code> |

**Kind**: global function  

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| search | <code>string</code> | Location search string |
